title: Procurement of printing and supplying of Lottery tickets drawn by the	Development Lotteries Board
decision_details:
- Bids have been invited following the National competitive bidding procedure based	on each brand of lottery for the procurement of printing and supplying of computerized draw lottery tickets; Lagna wasanawa, Ada Kotipathi, Shanida, Super Ball, Development Fortune, Jayoda, Kapruka and Sasiri for the Development	Lotteries Board for a period of one year from May 2023. Six (06) bidders have	submitted bids for the same. The proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Economic Stabilization and National Policies to award the procurement to print and supply the relevant lottery tickets as follows upon recommendations of the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee and the Procurement Appeal Board, was approved by the Cabinet. 

*	Awarding the Procurement to print and supply the lottery tickets Lagna wasanawa, Ada Kotipathi, Super Ball and Kapruka to Grand Export (Pvt.) Ltd.

*	Awarding the Procurement to print and supply the lottery tickets Shanida, Jayoda, Development Fortune and Sasiri to Printcare Secure Ltd.
